contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox U.S. County| county = Garfield County| state = Nebraska | founded = Organized in 1884 | seat wl = Burwell | largest city wl = Burwell | area_total_sq_mi =571 | area_land_sq_mi =570 | area_water_sq_mi =1 | area percentage = 0.23% | census yr = 2010| pop = 2049 | density_km2 =1| ex image = Garfield County Courthouse (Nebraska) from W.JPG | ex image cap = Garfield County Courthouse in Burwell, Nebraska | web = www.garfieldcounty.ne.gov| |}} '''Garfield County''' is a [[County (US)|county]] located in the [[U.S. state]] of [[Nebraska]]. As of 2010, the population was 2,049. Its [[county seat]] is [[Burwell, Nebraska|Burwell]]{{GR|6}}. In the [[Vehicle registration plates of Nebraska|Nebraska license plate system]], Garfield County is represented by the prefix 83 (it had the eighty-third-largest number of vehicles registered in the county when the license plate system was established in 1922). ==Geography== According to the [[United States Census Bureau|U.S. Census Bureau]], the county has a total area of {{convert|571|sqmi|1}}, of which {{convert|570|sqmi|1}} is land and {{convert|1|sqmi|1}} (0.23%) is water. ===Major highways=== * [[File:N-11.svg|20px]] [[Nebraska Highway 11]] * [[File:N-70.svg|20px]] [[Nebraska Highway 70]] * [[File:N-91.svg|20px]] [[Nebraska Highway 91]] * [[File:N-96.svg|20px]] [[Nebraska Highway 96]] ===Adjacent counties=== *[[Wheeler County, Nebraska]] - (East) *[[Valley County, Nebraska]] - (South) *[[Loup County, Nebraska]] - (West) *[[Holt County, Nebraska]] - (North) {{Geographic Location |Centre = Garfield County, Nebraska |North = [[Holt County, Nebraska|Holt County]] |Northeast = |East = [[Wheeler County, Nebraska|Wheeler County]] |Southeast = |South = [[Valley County, Nebraska|Valley County]] |Southwest = |West = [[Loup County, Nebraska|Loup County]] |Northwest = }} ==Demographics== {| border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="float:right; margin-left:10px;" |align=center colspan=2| '''Garfield County<br>Population by decade''' |- | align=center | 1890 - 1,659 <br> 1900 - 2,127 <br> 1910 - 3,417 <br> 1920 - 3,496 <br> 1930 - 3,207 <br> 1940 - 3,444 <br> 1950 - 2,912 <br> 1960 - 2,699 <br> 1970 - 2,411 <br> 1980 - 2,363 <br> 1990 - 2,141 <br> 2000 - 1,902 <br> 2010 - 2,049 <br> |} As of the [[census]]{{GR|2}} of 2000, there were 1,902 people, 813 households, and 529 families residing in the county. The [[population density]] was 3 people per square mile (1/km²). There were 1,021 housing units at an average density of 2 per square mile (1/km²). The racial makeup of the county was 98.79% [[Race (United States Census)|White]], 0.21% [[Race (United States Census)|Native American]], 0.05% [[Race (United States Census)|Asian]], 0.05% [[Race (United States Census)|Pacific Islander]], 0.37% from [[Race (United States Census)|other races]], and 0.53% from two or more races. 1.00% of the population were [[Race (United States Census)|Hispanic]] or [[Race (United States Census)|Latino]] of any race. There were 813 households out of which 26.10% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 59.70% were [[Marriage|married couples]] living together, 3.60% had a female householder with no husband present, and 34.90% were non-families. 32.70% of all households were made up of individuals and 20.00% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.27 and the average family size was 2.88. In the county the population was spread out with 23.50% under the age of 18, 4.40% from 18 to 24, 20.50% from 25 to 44, 26.80% from 45 to 64, and 24.80% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 46 years. For every 100 females there were 91.90 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 85.40 males. The median income for a household in the county was $27,407, and the median income for a family was $34,762. Males had a median income of $24,563 versus $16,146 for females. The [[per capita income]] for the county was $14,368. About 9.70% of families and 12.60% of the population were below the [[poverty line]], including 11.50% of those under age 18 and 18.60% of those age 65 or over. ==Localities== ===City=== * [[Burwell, Nebraska|Burwell]] ===Other places=== *[[Deverre, Nebraska|Deverre]] *[[Gables, Nebraska|Gables]] ==See also== *[[National Register of Historic Places listings in Nebraska#Garfield County|National Register of Historic Places listings in Garfield County, Nebraska]] ==References== <references /> {{Garfield County, Nebraska}} {{Nebraska}} {{coord|41.89|-98.98|display=title|type:adm2nd_region:US-NE_source:UScensus1990}} [[Category:Garfield County, Nebraska| ]] [[Category:Nebraska counties]]
